name: Larchmont
tagline: Village Charm on Long Island Sound
overview: Larchmont is Southern Westchester's most beloved waterfront village. Tree-lined streets, a charming walkable downtown packed with independent restaurants and boutiques, and direct access to Long Island Sound make this one of the most desirable communities in the region. The Metro-North New Haven Line connects to Grand Central in about 35 minutes.
